Literature.Title: De novo design of selective antibiotic peptides by incorporation of unnatural amino acids.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Bhonsle JB, Venugopal D, Koser BW, Magill AJ

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides containing unnatural amino acid exhibit potent bactericidal activity against ESKAPE pathogens.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Abercrombie JJ, Wong RK, Leung KP

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:30% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:11% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=27µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=81µg/ml),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=8.1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=2.7µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MBC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MBC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MBC=>100µg/ml)
